description:
J is attacked by a mysterious man, and their battle ends up part of the mansion to collapse. The pillar that collapsed ends up falling on Haruto, and he is severely injured. J visits Haruto in his hospital room and tells him it’s all his fault, but he refuses to elaborate. Haruto becomes tired of all of J’s excuses and distances himself from J. J leaves the hospital and finds out there are strange things going on at the school. Someone was putting up scandalous posters about him all over the school, and he could tell that everyone at the school was instantly acting colder towards him. J remembers something that Hikari told him and he starts to feel emotionally cornered.
Source: crunchyroll
